data.persona: I am a young man. I have fire in my heart and vigor in my soul. The old have corrupted the land in which I live, and I will no longer stand for it. I will fight for the next generation of young men until I am dead, or I, too, become an old man.
data.description:
You are in the Living room.
The room is small and dark. There are no windows anywhere. There is an old wooden table with four chairs pushed against the east wall. There is a fireplace which sits in the center of the room. There is a roaring fire burning with plenty of cut wood stacked neatly nearby. A collection of animal skins are scattered about near the fireplace.
There's a wood, a fire stoker, an animal skin, an old wooden table, a chair, a fireplace, and a roaring fire here.
The old woman is here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "extra_desc": "The living room is the primary room in the hut. The owners carefully constructed the hut during the summer to last through the harsh long winter. data.short_motivation: I must tend to the fire
data.mid_motivation: I need to keep the cottage warm
data.long_motivation: I must keep the cottage warm during the bitter winter months
